name: Step Up (itch) (cambryx)
description:
A small puzzle platformer where you have to jump on your past selfs to reach the goal

Every 10 seconds you turn into an unmovable block. Use this to your advantage to collect keys and reach gates.

Tutorial
  • Your goal is to reach the gates that start to glow when you’ve collected enough keys
  • Look around, reset the level and open the level picker with your mouse
  • Move using WASD or the arrow keys
  • Optionally jump with space
  • Every 10 seconds you turn into an unmovable block that you can jump on
